mapper.select: SELECT STOREROOM_ID FROM p_storeroom_out WHERE FIND_IN_SET(OUT_ID, #{StoreroomOutIds})

SELECT cs.*, cspo.NUM AS outNum, td.DEPT_NAME AS toDeptName FROM cy_storeroom AS cs LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_out AS pso ON(pso.STOREROOM_ID = cs.ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS cspo ON(cspo.ID=pso.OUT_ID) LEFT JOIN t_dept AS td ON(td.DEPT_ID=cspo.TO_DEPT_ID) WHERE FIND_IN_SET(pso.OUT_ID, #{StoreroomOutId})
